name: Hawker Center for Integrative Medicine - COVID Vaccine Clinic
address: 1750 112th Avenue Northeast, STE C-102, Bellevue WA, 98004
info:
At the Hawker Center, we provide a warm oasis of peace and comfort, treating our patients and their stories with patience and respect. Imagine a spa-like atmosphere where a highly-trained doctor or nurse is administrating the COVID19 vaccination. That’s the Hawker Center difference.
***We currently are providing the 1st and 2nd doses of MODERNA.*** Please sign up for an appointment time.  Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay for 15 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction.***If you would like to find out more information about our clinic, please visit our website at www.hawkerhealth.com***
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Dayton General Hospital - COVID Vaccine Clinic
address: Dayton Elementary School Multi Purpose Room, 614 S. 3rd Street, DAYTON Washington, 99328
info: This Pfizer covid-19 vaccination clinic is open to anyone 12 and older and for 2nd shots of vaccine for those who received their first shot on May 19, 2021 at the Dayton Elementary School.  Children under the age of 18 years must be accompanied by their parent or legal guardian.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Western Washington University
info: Second dose Pfizer clinic for those who were vaccinated here on May 19.  First doses also available for anyone 12+
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: SHD Mobile COVID Vaccination Site
address: Archbishop Murphy High School, Everett WA, 98208
info:
**THIS IS A PFIZER CLINIC**
Starting May 13, 2021, everyone 12 and older in Washington is eligible for COVID-19 vaccination.

Please also note that, you must be 12 or older for the Pfizer vaccine. Any minors receiving the vaccine will need a parent or guardian *physically present* to sign the consent form. 

Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay between 15-30 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. Medical staff will be on hand. A mask must be worn at all times during the appointment, and please wear clothing with short or loose sleeves.

****IF YOU ARE SCHEDULING YOUR 2ND DOSE APPOINTMENT, YOU MUST PROVIDE PROOF OF 1ST DOSE (example: vaccination card, medical record, myir.net immunization record)****
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Evergreen State Fairgrounds Covid-19 Vaccine Site
info:
**************THIS IS MODERNA 2ND DOSE CLINIC******************
Everyone 12 and older in Washington is eligible for COVID-19 vaccination. 

Please also note that, even if you are otherwise eligible, you must be 18 or older for the Moderna or Johnson & Johnson vaccine, and 12 or older for the Pfizer vaccine (parent/guardian must be present to sign the consent form). 

Appointments are highly recommended but not required. Please arrive no more than 10 minutes prior to your appointment time. Expect to stay between 15-30 minutes after you receive your vaccine to monitor for any adverse reaction. Medical staff will be on hand. A mask must be worn at all times during the appointment, and please wear clothing with short or loose sleeves. 

****IF YOU ARE SCHEDULING YOUR 2ND DOSE APPOINTMENT, YOU MUST PROVIDE PROOF OF 1ST DOSE (example: vaccination card, medical record, myir.net immunization record)****
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Onestop Medical Clinic - Covid Vaccination Venue
info:
• Onestop Medical, a Primary Care Clinic is serving the community by administering COVID-19 vaccines as a giving back in the current difficult situation since January 2021. Please DO NOT disrespect our hardworking staff and volunteers. No profanity please.
	
	• We are administering Pfizer COVID-19 vaccines to the patients age 12 years and above.
	
	• Due to the social distancing limitations and limited parking, please plan to arrive NO earlier than 5 Minutes. Please DO NOT park in front of our neighbor’s building; 1316 Central Ave S. The extra public parking is available next door at the Kent Municipal Court (1220 Central Ave S, Kent, WA 98032).
	
	• We ask that for everyone’s safety, please DO NOT visit this vaccination drive without an appointment. Please DO NOT email or call us to inquire, schedule, reschedule, cancel your appointment about COVID-19 Vaccine as we are experiencing extremely high email and call volumes. Please DO NOT book an appointment from the Zocodoc or Onestop Medical's website for COVID-19 Immunization.
	
	• Please schedule your Dose 2 through Prepmod.doh.wa.gov between 21 to 42 (at least 17 days considering grace period) days apart. Please DO NOT laminate the vaccine card. 
 
	• Please remember that you will need to bring your photo ID/Passport, medical insurance card (if insured). If you're receiving your 2nd vaccination, you will be required to bring your vaccination card too.

	• We DO NOT accept any form of payment, donation for COVID-19 vaccine from any patient. Please DO NOT make any payment to the Onestop Medical. If you receive a bill for your COVID vaccine, please contact your insurance company First.
	If you DO NOT have an insurance, no worries and you will still receive your vaccine.
	If you have Insurance a small Admin Fee will be charged to the insurance. The patient DOES NOT PAY for any vaccine related services out-of-pocket  The Admin Fee will be used to help cover a portion of the cost to maintain the staff, PPEs and all medical need.
	
	https://www.doh.wa.gov/Emergencies/COVID19/VaccineInformation/VaccineCost#heading67668
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Yakima County Health District COVID Vaccination Site
vaccines: Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine, Pfizer-BioNTech COVID-19 Vaccine
info: ***PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!! Enter fairgrounds through Gate 15 off of Pacific Avenue. Be prepared to show confirmation of your appointment or you may experience a slightly longer wait. Masks are required. Please wear clothing which allows access to your shoulder. Vaccinations at this site are reserved for people who live and/or work in Washington State. All Minors age 17 and Under must be accompanied by a parent. Ingresar por la puerta 15 en la avenida Pacífico. Se requieren máscaras. Por favor, use ropa que permita acceso a su brazo. Las vacunas en este sitio están reservadas para las personas que viven o trabajan en el estado de Washington. Todos los menores de 17 años o menos deben ir con su padres.*** PFIZER VACCINATIONS*** !!!!VACUNAS DE PFIZER!!!
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
